Description: Body sherd of Chian Grand Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; part of lion with body in added white and details in dilute brown and mane in dark added red, to left; exterior: surface almost completely worn.
Curator's comments: The light on dark figurative decoration on the interior surface of chalices is rare and found only in the Grand Style.
Bibliographic references: Williams 2006a / The Chian Pottery from Naukratis (p. 130, fig. 13)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0785) (phase 2)
